name: Wooden Block Puzzle Games
description:
Fun, easy to pick up and relaxing - get the best puzzle app today!

Join millions of players across the world playing Wooden Blocks! Ideal for all ages - adults, kids, boys and girls!

Wooden Blocks Features:
- Free to play with no annoying IAPs.
- Simple and fun puzzles to keep your brain sharp!
- Can be enjoyed by all of the family.
- Easy to pick up but hard to master.
- Relax and unwind, reduce stress.

Download and enjoy now!
